issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description: If you launch the test Base UI>Views>Options Dialog while the device is rotated 90 degrees clockwise, the test loads upside down. This does not occur with 1.6.2.

Steps to Reproduce:
1) Install KS 1.7.0 on Nexus S
2) Rotate device 90 degrees clockwise
3) Navigate to Base UI>Views>Options Dialog and launch

Result:
The test loads upside down

Expected Result:
The test should load with the correct orientation (or at least fix to portrait)

Notes:
fields.summary: Android: KitchenSink Options Dialog test will load upside down when device is rotated 90 degree clockwise
fields.environment: Nexus S (2.3.2), Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201104280957, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (05/05/11 13:06 1328fa0...)

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
